back: There is no door behind you. Look forward. It will be better that way.
depth-one: You are 1 room into the maze.
desc-room: You are in a room. There are
desc-sitting: You are sitting in the room. Stand up and take a look around.
enter-invalid: Invalid input. Please enter a valid door number.
enter-sitting: Stand up if you actually want to get to a door.
exit-confirm: Are you sure? The game will not automatically save.
exit-no-save: The game was not saved. Your progress was saved if you saved it yourself.
exit-question: Are you sure? This will not save automatically.
help:
This can be helpful. 
General commands: help, exit, quit 
Status commands: look 
Movement commands: enter N, back, sit, stand 
Localization commands: set-locale, check-locale, list-locales 
Meta: save, load, list-saves, remove-save
load-bad-save: Save file incomplete or corrupt. Please delete this save.
sit: You sit down in the room. Not much seems to happen.
stand: You stand back up. There is forward to consider.
